iso8601UTC.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

NetworkInterface.description: The container for the network interface.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 5  

Maximum Length: 500  

Pattern: ^arn:[^:]+:s3-outposts:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:outpost\/[^:]+\/endpoint/[a-zA-Z0-9]{19}$  

Update requires: No interruption

CidrBlock.description: The VPC CIDR committed by this endpoint.
CidrBlock.markdownDescription:
The VPC CIDR committed by this endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 20   

Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: The time the endpoint was created.
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
The time the endpoint was created.

---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
The ID of the endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 5  

Maximum Length: 500  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{19}$  

Update requires: No interruption

NetworkInterfaces.description: The network interfaces of the endpoint.
NetworkInterfaces.markdownDescription:
The network interfaces of the endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

OutpostId.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.
OutpostId.markdownDescription:
The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(op-[a-f0-9]{17}|\d{12}|ec2)$  

Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group to use with the endpoint.
SecurityGroupId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the security group to use with the endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 100  

Pattern: ^sg-([0-9a-f]{8}|[0-9a-f]{17})$  

Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

SubnetId.description: The ID of the subnet in the selected VPC. The subnet must belong to the Outpost.
SubnetId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the subnet in the selected VPC. The subnet must belong to the Outpost.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 100  

Pattern: ^subnet-([0-9a-f]{8}|[0-9a-f]{17})$  

Update requires: No interruption

AccessType.description: The type of access for the on-premise network connectivity for the Outpost endpoint. To access endpoint from an on-premises network, you must specify the access type and provide the customer owned Ipv4 pool.
AccessType.markdownDescription:
The type of access for the on-premise network connectivity for the Outpost endpoint. To access endpoint from an on-premises network, you must specify the access type and provide the customer owned Ipv4 pool.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

CustomerOwnedIpv4Pool.description: The ID of the customer-owned IPv4 pool for the Endpoint. IP addresses will be allocated from this pool for the endpoint.
CustomerOwnedIpv4Pool.markdownDescription:
The ID of the customer-owned IPv4 pool for the Endpoint. IP addresses will be allocated from this pool for the endpoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^ipv4pool-coip-([0-9a-f]{17})$  

Update requires: No interruption
